claim_card.claim: The metric is framed as secondary: defining u_B≔∂_BΦ and requiring divergence-free flow (θ=0) is claimed to reproduce the Einstein field equation G_BC = 8π Φ_BC as an effective relation on Σ.
claim_card.test_hook: Translate the construction into a calculable setting; test whether θ=0 implies an Einstein-like relation under the paper’s definitions.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: Requiring a divergence-free flow (θ = 0) reproduces the Einstein field equation
